Summary: TV commercial accidentally captures flight of UFO.
divs: sighting details on ge's latest commercial for "ecomagination",in the last frame before it ends, i've spotted a ufo in it. as your viewing the commercial just take a look in the upper right hand corner, under the 'blinding' light being shown and you can see a white lit ball appear out of nowhere (moving from about the center to the extreme right). it zips past the big light and disappears out of the frame. i am serious about this report and i am a sober person. i work in a civilian capacity for the government, in the field of accounting\finance (and i have been for many years). the object in question is not a plane,helicopter, star or a flare. but,in the commercial, compared to the big blinding light, it appears fairly small. i told my wife about this and she noticed the anomaly too. she agrees with me also that it can only be categorized as a ufo. i don't think ge knows about this object in their commercial yet and if it is widely mentioned, i am afraid that they will pull the ad off tv. i have not recorded the commercial\ufo. i beleive that someone should and try to analyze the video.
